首先，酒吧位於 6 樓，有專用電梯通往酒吧，酒吧位於新宿廣場內。走進大樓大廳右轉，就會看到電梯，上面貼著Fancy Bar的海報廣告。

現在，到酒吧本身。服務人員非常細心和耐心。每個人都渴望取悅我們，讓我們一行 6 人感到非常舒適和受歡迎。  飲用水經常被補充，而無需我們要求。

對於酒吧來說，食物出奇的好。我們推薦烤雞配烤蔬菜。我知道，這聽起來很無聊，但事實證明它很受歡迎。  莎莎醬豬肉也是贏家。  義大利麵很美味，但並不引人注目。  泰式綠咖哩蝦很好吃，但是，它嘗起來沒有傳統泰式咖哩的味道。我們確實推薦它，只是把它想像成一道辣蝦菜。  麵疙瘩也是如此。  想像一下這是一個馬鈴薯和鮭魚子的炸丸子，你的味蕾會很高興。

最後是雞尾酒。  感謝調酒師。當然，也有一些失誤和失誤，不過，工作做得很好。  我們最喜歡的是 Spicy Gentlemen、Tide 和 Lavender Mist 的味道，不過，我建議他們給我們一個攪拌器，因為由於液態氮突然變冷，一些糖凝結在玻璃底部。
如果想看戲劇，我們推薦菊花銀河、薰衣草迷霧和花生芋頭拼盤。  不幸的是，我不會誠實地推薦花生芋頭飲料的味道。
蓮花季節令人愉快，儘管蜂肉在視覺上很吸引我們，但在味道晴雨表上卻達不到要求。

總的來說，這是一個非常愉快和令人滿意的夜晚，我們強烈推薦參觀 Fancy Bar。
EN:
First of all, the bar is located on the 6th floor. There is a special elevator to the bar. The bar is located in Shinjuku Square.Turning in the building hall to the right, you will see the elevator, which is posted on the poster advertisement of Fancy Bar.

Now, go to the bar itself.The service staff is very careful and patient.Everyone is eager to please us, making 6 people feel very comfortable and popular.Drinking water is often supplemented without our request.

For bars, food is surprisingly good.We recommend grilled chicken with roasted vegetables.I know that it sounds boring, but it turns out that it is very popular.Sasha sauce pork is also a winner.The pasta is delicious, but it is not eye -catching.The Thai -style green curry shrimp is delicious, but it tastes without the taste of traditional Thai curry.We really recommend it, just imagine it as a spicy shrimp.The same is true of noodles.Imagine that this is a fried ball of potato and salmon, and your taste buds will be very happy.

Finally, cocktails.Thank you bartender.Of course, there are some mistakes and mistakes, but the work is well done.Our favorite is the taste of Spicy Gentlemen, Tide and Lavender Mist, but I suggest that they give us a mixer because some sugar condenses at the bottom of the glass because liquid nitrogen suddenly becomes cold.
If you want to watch the drama, we recommend chrysanthemum galaxy, lavender fog and peanut taro platter.Unfortunately, I will not honestly recommend the taste of peanut taro drinks.
The lotus season is pleasant. Although the bee meat is visually attractive, it does not meet the requirements on the smell of the barometer.

In general, this is a very happy and satisfactory night, and we strongly recommend visiting Fancy Bar.
